text: Mana khulwa â€“ okhufunaka indache yabu, khwabatsuba mana nikhukhola emioyo chiabu okhuba emiumu (echilawulila amalayi) bakalukhaninjia amakhuwa habundu wako. Ne balekhanga ebuleka wabetsulisibwa. Ne olatsililila okhunyoola amakhuwa kobukalakala bwabu, halali batiti mubo. Mana baleshele ne olekhane ninabo. Toto Nyasaye yachama balia bakholanga amalayi
